content: this tiny crochet roasted turkey captures the nostalgia of past thanksgiving gatherings and the warmth of home and family it makes a great harvest decor accent keychain or dollhouse miniature **the pattern is free with ads on my website ** > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over > 400 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership > here 1 1 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/the-crochet-club/ ref=ravelry > please add the pattern to your ravelry favorites
